keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make sure the best new cancer drugs that are widely available in other countries are also available on the NHS and increase funding for the NHS every year.
Increase the basic state pension and restore the link with earnings, keeping the winter fuel allowance.
Keep and improve Sure Start, employing 4,200 new Sure Start health visitors.
Work with local councils to freeze Council Tax for two years.
Improve discipline in schools by giving teachers more powers.
Cut immigration by imposing an annual limit on the number of non-economic migrants, and creating a new Border Police Force.
Change politics by cutting the number of MPs by 10%, cutting ministerial pay, and allowing local people to remove MPs who are not performing.

issues.economy: Immediate action to start cutting government waste, saving billions in interest. Tackle benefit fraud, and introduce a new tax on the banks rather than a tax on jobs.
issues.education: Improve discipline in schools by giving teachers more powers.
issues.governance: Change politics by cutting the number of MPs by 10%, cutting ministerial pay, and allowing local people to remove MPs who are not performing.
issues.health: Make sure the best new cancer drugs that are widely available in other countries are also available on the NHS and increase funding for the NHS every year.
issues.immigration: Cut immigration by imposing an annual limit on the number of non-economic migrants, and creating a new Border Police Force.
